introText:
Well done in taking steps to explore how you can secure your business premises.

This quiz will take roughly 5-10 minutes. You will be able to print a report at the end of the quiz with suggestions on things you can do to improve your business safety and security.

If you have any questions or would like to talk about your business safety:

Territory Business Advisor:
1800 193 111 or businessinfo@nt.gov.au

If you have experienced a crime and would like support you can contact

Victims of Crime NT:
Level 2, 71 Smith St, Darwin City, Darwin 0800. PH: 08 8941 0995
4/15 Leichardt Tce, Alice Springs 0871, PH: 08 8952 4466

These questionnaires have been developed in line with Crime Prevention Through Environmental Design (CPTED) principles and business safety and security audit checklists. Safety and security experts were consulted during their development.

Disclaimer

Laws and regulations can change over time. While we aim to provide accurate guidance and point you to helpful resources, it's important that you check whether the information is suitable for your specific situation. Every business is different, so please make sure any advice or material you use is right for your circumstances before making decisions or taking action.
finalSummary: Based on your answers, we provide recommendations to improve safety.
